summary: Comprehensive testing of Pat Church website completed. All critical features working: Tools page Website Analyzer renders correctly after fix, Admin dashboard authentication flow works, protected endpoints return 401 without auth, Homepage/Services/Contact pages render correctly, Lead form submission works.

minor.issue: Returns 520 server error intermittently - may need investigation

action_items: Minor: Investigate newsletter subscription endpoint 520 errors
critical_code_review_comments: ToolsPage.js fix verified - safe null checks for quality_analysis, seo_data, search_strategies, lead_criteria, planning_tips arrays working correctly
Admin authentication properly implemented with X-Admin-Key header verification
All /api/leads endpoints correctly protected with 401 response for unauthorized access

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all pages load, forms work, admin login works)

seed_data_creation: Created test leads with TEST_ prefix during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features tested and working. Backend API tests in /app/test_reports/pytest/test_backend_api.py cover: health endpoints, admin auth, leads CRUD, tools endpoints, contact form. PayPal integration uses MOCKED placeholder credentials.

mocked_apis.PayPal: Uses placeholder credentials - not fully functional for real payments

features_tested.homepage: PASS - Renders correctly with hero, navigation, features
